AgentRuntimeArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: arn:(-[^:]+)?:bedrock-agentcore:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:agent/[A-Fa-f0-9]{8}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{4}-[A-Fa-f0-9]{12}:([0-9]{0,4}[1-9][0-9]{0,4})  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,99}-[a-zA-Z0-9]{10}  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]{0,47}  
Update requires: No interruption

ClientToken.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 33  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentRuntimeVersion.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 5  
Pattern: ([1-9][0-9]{0,4})  
Update requires: No interruption

LastUpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

AgentStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATING | CREATE_FAILED | UPDATING | UPDATE_FAILED | READY | DELETING  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1200
